thread.title: Gabriel Jesus was convinced to snub Real Madrid and Barcelona for Manchester City by Fernandinho
thread.title_full: Gabriel Jesus was convinced to snub Real Madrid and Barcelona for Manchester City by Fernandinho

author: Joe Mewis
title: Gabriel Jesus was convinced to snub Real Madrid and Barcelona for Manchester City by Fernandinho
text:
Gabriel Jesus was convinced to snub Real Madrid and Barcelona for Manchester City by Fernandinho It was the City midfielder's personal touch that convinced the 19-year-old to snub the La Liga duo Share City fans have Fernandinho to thank for landing Gabriel Jesus (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Gabriel Jesus was convinced to snub Real Madrid and Barcelona for Manchester City by his new team-mate Fernandinho . 
The 19-year-old has made an explosive to start to life at the Etihad, scoring three goals in two Premier League starts after his £27million switch from Palmeiras was sealed last month. 
The teenager's form in Brazilian alerted some of Europe's biggest clubs, but it was Fernandinho's personal intervention that sealed the deal for Pep Guardiola's side. 
"I just asked him to choose City - to come here. I talked to him and was honest with him,” he told the Sun . 
“A lot of big teams wanted to sign him, especially Barcelona and Real Madrid. I just told him ‘look, you can take the team sheets of Barcelona and Madrid and see what player of 19 years old plays there in the starting 11.'
